teaser: A massive rail project could have a major impact on the economies of five African countries.
title: Kenyan rail project could be a boon to several African nations
description: A massive rail project could have a major impact on the economies of five African countries.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, November 29, 2013
contentencoded: There's just been a groundbreaking for a $4 billion railway from the port of Mombasa in Kenya to the capital Nairobi. It's the first phase of a massive rail project that could directly affect the economies of five East and Central African countries. The BBC's Emmanuel Igunza reports on the story from Nairobi.
